alert.note: Alert for Kauai Mountains; Kauai Southwest; Niihau (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued February 21 at 1:16PM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH FOR NIIHAU AND KAUAI THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM HST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flash flooding caused by excessive rainfall is possible. * WHERE...Niihau and Kauai. * WHEN...Until 6 PM HST this evening. * IMPACTS...Flood prone roads and other low lying areas may be closed due to elevated runoff and overflowing streams. Urban areas may receive more significant flooding and property damage due to rapid runoff. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Deepening low pressure west of the state is producing heavy showers over the western end of the state. Given that soils are already saturated and streams elevated, flash flooding may develop.
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.
